p: In the present study, mortality data of cardiovascular diseases from database of Mashhad municipality were used according to the International Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems 10 th Revision (ICD-10) including codes 100–199 ( 41), for (2004–2013) period. Daily meteorological variables of maximum and minimum temperature (°C), precipitation (mm) and solar radiation (MJm −2day −1) for Mashhad were obtained from the Iran Meteorological Organization, in (1986–2005) period.
